scripts.export:local: node andb export -f LOCAL && node andb export -p LOCAL && node andb export -t LOCAL
scripts.export:dev: npm run export:dev:fn && npm run export:dev:sp && npm run export:dev:tbl
scripts.export:uat: npm run export:uat:fn && npm run export:uat:sp && npm run export:uat:tbl
scripts.export:stage: npm run export:stage:fn && npm run export:stage:sp && npm run export:stage:tbl
scripts.export:prod: npm run export:prod:fn && npm run export:prod:sp && npm run export:prod:tbl
scripts.export:all: npm run export:dev && npm run export:uat && npm run export:stage && npm run compare:uat:off && npm run compare:stage:off
scripts.compare:dev:off: npm run compare:dev:fn && npm run compare:dev:sp && npm run compare:dev:tbl && npm run compare:dev:report
scripts.compare:uat:off: npm run compare:uat:fn && npm run compare:uat:sp && npm run compare:uat:tbl && npm run compare:uat:report
scripts.compare:stage:off: npm run compare:stage:fn && npm run compare:stage:sp && npm run compare:stage:tbl && npm run compare:stage:report
scripts.compare:prod:off: npm run compare:prod:fn && npm run compare:prod:sp && npm run compare:prod:tbl && npm run compare:prod:report
scripts.compare:dev: npm run export:dev && npm run compare:dev:off
scripts.compare:uat: npm run export:dev && npm run export:uat && npm run compare:uat:off
scripts.compare:stage: npm run export:uat && npm run export:stage && npm run compare:stage:off
scripts.compare:prod: npm run export:stage && npm run export:prod && npm run compare:prod:off
scripts.compare:uat:migrated: npm run export:uat && npm run compare:uat:off
scripts.compare:stage:migrated: npm run export:stage && npm run compare:stage:off
scripts.compare:prod:migrated: npm run export:prod && npm run compare:prod:off
scripts.migrate:dev: node andb migrate -f DEV && node andb migrate -p DEV && node andb migrate -t DEV
scripts.migrate:uat:new: node andb migrate -f UAT && node andb migrate -p UAT && node andb migrate -t UAT
scripts.migrate:uat:updated: node andb migrate -uf UAT && node andb migrate -up UAT && node andb migrate -ut UAT
scripts.migrate:uat:deprecated: node andb migrate -df UAT && node andb migrate -dp UAT
scripts.migrate:uat: npm run compare:uat && npm run migrate:uat:new && npm run migrate:uat:updated && npm run compare:uat:migrated
scripts.migrate:stage:new: node andb migrate -f STAGE && node andb migrate -p STAGE && node andb migrate -t STAGE
scripts.migrate:stage:updated: node andb migrate -uf STAGE && node andb migrate -up STAGE && node andb migrate -ut STAGE
scripts.migrate:stage:deprecated: node andb migrate -df STAGE && node andb migrate -dp STAGE
scripts.migrate:stage: npm run compare:stage:off && npm run migrate:stage:new && npm run migrate:stage:updated && npm run compare:stage:migrated
scripts.migrate:prod:new: node andb migrate -f PROD && node andb migrate -p PROD && node andb migrate -t PROD
scripts.migrate:prod:updated: node andb migrate -uf PROD && node andb migrate -up PROD && node andb migrate -ut PROD
scripts.migrate:prod:deprecated: node andb migrate -df PROD && node andb migrate -dp PROD
scripts.migrate:prod: npm run compare:prod:off && npm run migrate:prod:new && npm run migrate:prod:updated && npm run compare:prod:migrated
